author: mturk
msg: Each host has to be defined in the workers2.properties, so if the
host is provided in the request but non found in the uriMap return
NULL instead using default host (uri:/). Further more I reverted the
Natcho's patches for checking virtual hosts, cause all mappings are

author: mturk
msg: Cannot use the hostname:server_port cause the port is 0 for all
host:80 requests. Also is_virtual is used for separating default and
virtual hosts. In case of default server host the hostname provided
to uriMap _MUST_ be NULL to be able to map the default uri:/

author: nacho
msg: Bug#11364 - jk2 appears to forward all virtual host requests to Tomcat

author: mturk
msg: Fix the uriMap for VirtualHost, providing server name for virtual
hosts. Thx. to Dimitry Letin for that.

author: mturk
msg: Fix the memory leaks using not using global env allocation on
each request and freeing global env after the request.
